Peak near the Maine border

Exploring the wreckage of a 1954 plane crash in the Great North Woods of N.H.

  • Written: Oct 8, 2025
  • Date hiked: Jun 24, 2016
  • Peak: Mt. Success (3,565 feet)
  • Distance: 6.5 miles
  • Town: Milan
  • State: New Hampshire

The model is a Douglas Dc3 and crashed into Mt. Success in cold, late november when caught in a squall.

  • New Hampshire
  • Milan
